goal.ch: Students will learn statistical theory as well as methods of reliability and manage to apply the knowledge to life time data analysis.
goal.en: Students will learn statistical theory as well as methods of reliability and manage to apply the knowledge to life time data analysis

outline.ch:
“1. Reliability concepts and reliability data
2. Models, censoring, and likelihood for failure-time data
3. Degradation data, models, and analysis
4. Failure-time regression analysis
5. Accelerated test models
6. Accelerated life tests
7. Accelerated degradation analysis“
outline.en:
“1. Reliability concepts and reliability data
2. Models, censoring, and likelihood for failure-time data
3. Degradation data, models, and analysis
4. Failure-time regression analysis
5. Accelerated test models
6. Accelerated life tests
7. Accelerated degradation analysis“

textbook.ch:
“Text:    Statistical Methods for Reliability Data  by Meeker and Escobar (1998), Wiley.
References:   1.   Applied Life Data Analysis  by Nelson (1982), Wiley.
2.   Statistical Models and Methods for Lifetime Data, 2ed,  by Lawless (2002), Wiley.“
textbook.en:
“Text:    Statistical Methods for Reliability Data  by Meeker and Escobar (1998), Wiley.
References:   1.   Applied Life Data Analysis  by Nelson (1982), Wiley.
2.   Statistical Models and Methods for Lifetime Data, 2ed,  by Lawless (2002), Wiley.“

ch: 系所:限統計研究所碩士班、統計研究所博士班。指定課程:必須先修ST6021、先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
en: Department:MSc in Statistics、PhD in Statistics only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6021、Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
